name: svelte-every-layout
description: An implementation of the Every-Layout.dev components using Svelte that also includes cleaning up of styles
author: Aaron George <aaron.dean.george@gmail.com> (https://github.com/aarongeorge)

scripts.build: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=local npx parcel build ./src/index.pug --no-source-maps
scripts.build:prod: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx parcel build ./src/index.pug --no-source-maps
scripts.serve: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=local npx parcel serve ./src/index.pug
scripts.serve:prod: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx parcel serve ./src/index.pug
